typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		sensorid as string,
		timestamp as string,
		temperature_from_humidity as string,
		temperature_from_pressure as string,
		humidity as string,
		pressure as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 select(mapColumn(
		sensorid,
		timestamp,
		temperature = temperature_from_humidity,
		humidity,
		pressure
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> select1
select1 filter(temperature != '0') ~> filter1
filter1 derive(sensorid = toInteger(sensorid),
		timestamp = toDate(timestamp,'YYYY-MM-ddT*')) ~> derivedColumn1
derivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
